snippet.title: Dwarf Tower
snippet.description:
A sequel called Dwarven Skykeep is being developed! Check it out:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZneFeHMR_xA&t=13s

iosoftware LTD is devoted to developing video games in the style and feel of the 90's. We have made Palm Kingdoms - a 'heroes' strategy for iOS, Mac & Windows. 

Dwarf Tower is our new game, that takes some proven gameplay concepts, and puts them in a stylish form. Build your tower, gather spells, and use them to destroy the enemy tower. Challenge your friends in online multiplayer mode. 

Think of Sea Battle, mixed with some Worms fun, and Faster Than Light room management. Add beautiful pixel-art graphics, animation, and wonderful music from Kevin MacLeod. 

Sounds good? We encourage you to try the game right now: 


Windows: 

https://indiegamestand.com/store/958/dwarf-tower/

Mac OS: 

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/dwarf-tower/id834362804?mt=12

iOS version: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/dwarf-tower/id867438565?mt=8


Read the game rules here: https://www.facebook.com/notes/dwarf-tower/game-rules/1431683710411517 

(In Russian): https://www.facebook.com/notes/dwarf-tower/правила-игры/1431332260446662 


If you like the game so far, support our crowdfunding for extra fun: storyline mode similar to Faster Than Light, more landscapes, modding support, customizable rules, iOS / Android version, and more. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/dwarf-tower

Credit this piece (CC:By License)

Copy and paste the following text into your video's credits:
"Umbrella Pants" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
